sense.gloss: fur coat (to protect against the cold)
clothes made with the down of birds

k_ele.e: 千金の裘は一狐の腋に非ず

r_ele.r: せんきんのきゅうはいっこのえきにあらず

sense.gloss: to rule a country requires many great men, an expensive fur coat will not be made with a single fox
fine monk's robes worn by members of the imperial household, nobility, councilors (councillors), etc.
